articles.title: Antim wins Asian Championships silver, now comes the Vinesh question - ESPN India
articles.description: Antim's medal pushes into sharp context the major issue around Indian wrestling.
articles.content:
India's Antim Panghal won silver at the 2023 Asian Wrestling Championships in the 53kg division, after a 10-0 loss to Japanese phenom Akari Fujinami in Astana, Kazakhstan.
The medal also pushes into… [+2253 chars]
